4.20. umbra.components.factory.scriptEditor.workers¶

models.py

Platform:
Windows, Linux, Mac Os X.
Description:
This module defines the umbra.components.factory.scriptEditor.scriptEditor.ScriptEditor Component Interface class Workers.
